WizardTD

类 Mana

  • java.lang.Object
    • WizardTD.Mana

  • public class Mana
extends java.lang.Object
    Wizard's mana is displayed on the top of the screen, and it is the 'currency' in the game.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Mana(int initialMana, int initialManaCap, double initialManaGainedPerSecond, int manaPoolSpellInitialCost, int manaPoolSpellCostIncreasePerUse, double manaPoolSpellCapMultiplier, double manaPoolSpellManaGainedMultiplier) 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void decreaseCurrentMana(int amount)
      Decrease the current mana by a given amount.
      double getCurrentMana()
      Get current remaining mana.
      int getManaCap()
      Get the mana cap.
      float getManaPercentage()
      Get the percentage of current mana (out of the mana cap).
      int getManaPoolSpellCost()
      Get the cost to upgrade mana.
      void increaseCurrentMana(int amount)
      Increase the current mana by a given amount.
      void increaseCurrentManaByTime(double time)
      Increase the current mana by time in the game.
      void upgradeMana()
      Upgrade the mana pool, and decrease the current mana.

        返回:

      • getManaPercentage

        public float getManaPercentage()

        返回:

      • increaseCurrentManaByTime

        public void increaseCurrentManaByTime(double time)
        Increase the current mana by time in the game.
        参数:
        time - time passed to calculate the mana amount

      • increaseCurrentMana

        public void increaseCurrentMana(int amount)
        Increase the current mana by a given amount.
        参数:
        amount - amount of mana

      • decreaseCurrentMana

        Decrease the current mana by a given amount.
        参数:
        amount - amount of mana

        public void upgradeMana()
        Upgrade the mana pool, and decrease the current mana.
